Egor Lynov Website

Hi, my name is Egor and this is basic information about me

I was born on May 31, 1987 in Voronezh. I studied at the Koltsov's hymanisia. Then I graduated from the Faculty of Applied Mathematics and Mechanics of Voronezh State University as a specialty system programmer. I`m software engineer, backend-developer and DevOps. I have been working since 2009. I write in programming languages:

  • Perl
  • C++
  • PHP
  • Java
  • Python
  • JavaScript
  • TypeScript
  • Go
  • Rust
  • Erlang

I use technologies:

  • Docker
  • Kubernetes
  • WebAssembly
  • PostgreSQL
  • Linux
  • Node.js

and others.
